Articles.Content:
Has anyone made (or seen) a good replica of the F-111. I have been recently replicating a lot of real aircraft but I have been having trouble making one that looks nice. (modded craft are fine)

Edited July 22, 2018 by flashfire2205

https://kerbalx.com/ is a really great place to look for craft. I and a ton of the people in this community have posted their craft there for a long time - you'll find replicas of just about any craft you can think of (and plenty of non-replica craft to boot).

As for the F-111, I made a stock one a while ago complete with variable geometry wings.

https://kerbalx.com/servo/F-111-Aardvark

Admittedly, it's not anywhere near my best work, but it flies all right. 

 

As for modded ones, this is the best one on KerbalX (in visual accuracy, at least): https://kerbalx.com/enroger/General-Dynamics-F-111-Aardvark
